mapper.select: SELECT a.BOARD_SSN, a.TITLE, a.CONTENTS, a.ATT_FILE , a.U_NAME, a.REG_ID, a.REG_DT_YMD, a.HASH_TAG, a.SCRAPS, COUNT(a.SEQ) AS COMMENTS FROM( SELECT b.BOARD_SSN , b.TITLE, b.CONTENTS, b.ATT_FILE, b.U_NAME, b.REG_ID, b.HASH_TAG, c.SEQ , DATE_FORMAT(b.REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS REG_DT_YMD, COUNT(s.SCRAP_NO) AS SCRAPS FROM bboom_board b LEFT JOIN board_comment c ON b.BOARD_SSN=c.LINK_SEQ LEFT JOIN board_scrap s ON b.BOARD_SSN=s.LINK_SEQ GROUP BY b.BOARD_SSN, b.TITLE, b.CONTENTS, b.ATT_FILE, b.U_NAME, b.REG_ID, b.REG_DT, b.HASH_TAG, c.SEQ )a GROUP BY a.BOARD_SSN, a.TITLE, a.CONTENTS, a.ATT_FILE, a.U_NAME, a.REG_ID, a.REG_DT_YMD, a.SCRAPS, a.HASH_TAG

SELECT a.BOARD_SSN, a.TITLE, a.CONTENTS, a.ATT_FILE , a.U_NAME, a.REG_ID AS ID, a.REG_DT_YMD, a.HASH_TAG, a.SCRAPS, COUNT(a.SEQ) AS COMMENTS FROM( SELECT b.BOARD_SSN , b.TITLE, b.CONTENTS, b.ATT_FILE, b.U_NAME, b.REG_ID, b.HASH_TAG, c.SEQ , DATE_FORMAT(b.REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS REG_DT_YMD, COUNT(s.SCRAP_NO) AS SCRAPS FROM bboom_board b LEFT JOIN board_comment c ON b.BOARD_SSN=c.LINK_SEQ LEFT JOIN board_scrap s ON b.BOARD_SSN=s.LINK_SEQ GROUP BY b.BOARD_SSN, b.TITLE, b.CONTENTS, b.ATT_FILE, b.U_NAME, b.REG_ID, b.REG_DT, b.HASH_TAG, c.SEQ )a WHERE BOARD_SSN = #{boardSsn} GROUP BY a.BOARD_SSN, a.TITLE, a.CONTENTS, a.ATT_FILE, a.U_NAME, a.REG_ID, a.REG_DT_YMD, a.SCRAPS, a.HASH_TAG
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bboom_board(U_NAME, TITLE, CONTENTS, ATT_FILE, REG_ID, REG_DT ,HASH_TAG) VALUES (#{uName},#{title} ,#{contents}, #{attFile}, #{regId}, now(), #{hashTag})
mapper.select: SELECT *, DATE_FORMAT(REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS REG_DT_YMD FROM site_board
SELECT *, DATE_FORMAT(REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS REG_DT_YMD FROM site_board WHERE SEQ = #{seq}-1
SELECT *, DATE_FORMAT(REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS REG_DT_YMD FROM site_board WHERE SEQ = #{seq}+1
mapper.delete: DELETE board_scrap WHERE REG_ID=#{regId} AND LINK_SEQ=#{linkSeq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_comment(LINK_SEQ, CONTENTS, REG_NM, REG_DT) VALUES(#{linkSeq},#{contents},#{regNm},now())
mapper.delete: DELETE board_comment WHERE REG_NM=#{regNm} AND LINK_SEQ=#{linkSeq}
